settings.text:
Estimated Delivery Time:
Projector: 14 days after placing order.
Floor Rising Screen: 30 days after placing order.
• AWOL Pays your sales tax. Taxes are built into AWOL Visions prices, saving you hundreds of dollars per order.

•Tax-Inclusive, Save Around $200 For You

•Better Price and Service in Buy With Prime
Lead time is 90 working days. Delivery is to the fist available dry area. Inside delivery and setup is not included.

settings.title: FREE SHIPPING
settings.dialog_context:
Shipping fee

USA excluded Alaska and Hawaii

For products like projectors, screens and accessories, it is free standard shipment and the delivery time is  3-4 business days after the order is processed.

For products like Smart cabinet and  Vanish Rollable Laser TV, the shipping fee is from $150-$500 depending on the size and the style. The delivery time is 90 days after the order is processed.

Other US states, territories, and other countries

For products like projectors, screens, and accessories, the shipping fee is as follows:

Australia: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Canada: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-10 business days.

EU & UK: $100 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Hong Kong & Macao SAR: Free standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 days.

View more >

settings.title: AWOL’S COMMITMENTS
settings.dialog_context:
Free Return within 30 days

Undamaged products may be returned for a full refund for any reason within 30 days of the delivery date. Once the returned item arrives back in Awol Vision’s warehouse 16 Technology Dr, Suite 133, Irvine, CA 92618 for inspection, the refund process will begin.

View more >

24 Month Hassle-Free Warranty

Elevation Technology Partners (AWOL Vision) warrants our products to be free from defects in workmanship and materials, under normal residential or commercial use and conditions, for a period as listed below.
Laser TV / Projectors/Screens: 1-year limited warranty & 1-year free extended warranty (total 2-year warranty)
Smart Cabinets: 5 years on the cabinet; 2 years on mechanical and electrical components
Accessories: 1-year limited warranty

60 Days Price Match Guarantee

AWOL guarantees that we will refund you the difference if you find a lower price from us within 30 days of your purchase.

Lifetime Customer Support

We are committed to providing lifelong customer service support, so if you need help, please contact us.

settings.image_alt: Illuminate your space with the LTV-3000 Pro, boasting peak brightness for extraordinary picture quality any time of day.
settings.image_alt_mobile: The LTV-3000 Pro Projector shines with 3000 peak lumens, offering stunning visuals against an urban backdrop.

settings.image_alt: Graphically showing the AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro glass lens performance, offering users the best viewing experience.
settings.image_alt_mobile: It explicitly shows the AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro glass lens properties, offering the best viewing experience.

settings.image_alt: LTV-3000 Pro 4K 3D Triple Laser Projector with high lumens for vibrant clarity in a stylish design.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Sophisticated LTV-3000 Pro projector casting brilliant colors and sharp details, perfect for any home theater.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision 4K Laser Projector highlighting its close-to-perfection image clarity on a large 150
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision 4K laser ust projector delivering nearly perfect image clarity on expansive screens, with a cinematic visual.
settings.context:
In both upper corners of the image, the focus and clarity are
close to perfection, you can almost see the pixels appearing
when you get too close.

settings.image_alt: Cutting-edge LTV-3000 Pro Projector casting vibrant images for an immersive viewing experience.
settings.image_alt_mobile: The AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro 4K Triple Laser Projector's lifelike color display contrasts more than a billion colors of SDR and HDR content.
settings.context:
The color palette and behavior is handled flawlessly
whether it’s for SDR or HDR content.

settings.image_alt: AWOL 4K Laser UST projector displaying a captivating underwater scene with Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and Dolby Atmos features.
settings.image_alt_mobile: The AWOL projector showcases an underwater scene with detailed features like Dolby Vision and HDR10+ for a premium viewing experience.
settings.context:
With Dolby Vision, AWOL is the only RGB UST
projector in the market that offers Dolby Vision,
HDR 10+, Dolby Atmos, and Active 3D, It stands
out as the most comprehensive ultra-short
throw RGB laser projector available.

settings.image_alt: A movie adventure awaits with AWOL Vision Laser projector 3D capabilities, offering a better than IMAX 3D experience visualized by an astronaut's spacewalk.
settings.image_alt_mobile: An immersive cinematic journey with the AWOL Vision 4K UST Projector, boasting better than IMAX 3D movie quality.
settings.context:
Better than IMAX 3D, you will experience
an immersive “journey” with a movie.

settings.image_alt: Real-time gaming is redefined with AWOL Vision ultra-low-latency projector, presenting a thrilling car race with just 8ms lag in 1080p.
settings.image_alt_mobile: A racing game displayed on the AWOL Vision 4K Laser UST Projector with an impressive low input lag for gaming, ensuring real-time play.
settings.context:
Exhibits the lowest-ever large screen time lag of 8ms
to ensure that all your gaming action is real-time.

settings.image_alt: True to the director's vision, the AWOL Vision 4K UST Projector maintains a 24 FPS playback for a genuine cinematic experience.
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision 4K UST Projector supporting native 24 FPS for cinema purists, displaying movie clapboard to emphasize cinematic authenticity.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision 4K projector enhancing home audio with Dolby Atmos and DTS Virtual: X technologies, illustrated by a dolphin underwater scene.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Experience immersive cinema-quality sound with AWOL Vision 4K projector featuring Dolby Atmos and DTS Virtual:X, as shown with vivid underwater visuals.
settings.context:
By employing advanced height virtualization techniques
on top of traditional stereo, AWOL deliver an Immersion
audio experience.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision 4K projector's new laser dimming technology delivers enhanced black levels and contrast, demonstrated with before and after flamingo images.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Dramatically improved contrast and black levels on AWOL Vision 4K projector, featuring laser dimming technology, exemplified by richer flamingo visuals.
settings.context:
The implementation of Laser dimming technology has
greatly improved contrast, leading to a significant
enhancement in image quality.

settings.image_alt: Floor rising projector screen with 170-degree wide viewing angle, displaying a tropical beach scene for immersive home theater experience.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Cinematic+ ALR screen featuring a 170-degree wide viewing angle, showing a stunning beach view for an enhanced visual experience.

settings.image_alt: AWOL VISION 120-inch Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen with 4K/8K HDR, active 3D, and 95% ceiling ambient light rejecting.
settings.image_alt_mobile: 120-inch Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen by AWOL VISION featuring precision dimming and ultra contrast.
settings.headTitle:
Maximize your home theater
experience with top-level materials
settings.context: -AWOL VISION 120" Cinematic ALR Floor Rising Screen

settings.image_alt: Comparison between Cinematic+ ALR Screen and other projector screens, highlighting easy floor rising adjustment with remote.
settings.image_alt_mobile: A comparison of Cinematic+ ALR Screen and other screens, showing floor rising adjustment feature.

settings.image_alt: Cinematic+ ALR Screen synchronized with projector, showing effortless rise and fall with USB trigger and remote control.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Cinematic+ ALR Screen showing sync feature with projector, highlighting rise and fall with remote and USB trigger.
settings.headTitle:
Projector's partner in sync.
Effortless rise and fall
settings.context:
Just connect the USB Synchronized Trigger to your
projector's USB port, and watch in awe as the motorized
screen rises when you power on the projector and
lowers when you power it off.

settings.image_alt: Cinematic+ ALR Screen with 3D stereo surround sound, featuring acoustic transparent technology for immersive sound.
settings.image_alt_mobile: 3D stereo surround sound feature of Cinematic+ ALR Screen, offering acoustic transparency for superior audio experience.
settings.context:
0.4mm sound hole is designed with an acoustic
transparent feature for a surround sound
experience that will give you all the cinematic thrill

settings.image_alt: Cinematic+ ALR Screen compared with other materials like white wall and crystal PET, showing superior HBSI ALR screen quality.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Comparison of Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen demonstrating ambient light rejection capabilities.

settings.image_alt: Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen comparison showing 95% ceiling ambient light rejection.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Comparison of Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen demonstrating ambient light rejection capabilities.
settings.headTitle: 95% Ceiling Ambient Light Rejecting

settings.image_alt: Family enjoying an immersive viewing experience with Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen providing a super immersive viewing experience for a family.

settings.image_alt: Elevate your entertainment with a remote-controlled Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Remote control operation of the Cinematic+ ALR floor rising projector screen is convenient and simple.
